item.title: 15% of CEOs Are at Risk of This $10.2 Million Business Problem
item.description: New year, same threat. It’s only more expensive and more damaging.

item.title: She Made Her First Million At 30. Here’s the First Step She Says Everyone Should Take
item.description: Michela Allocca quadrupled her income after quitting her corporate role.

item.title: Before Zoom Became a Verb, It Was a Visa Application
item.description: How one rejected Chinese engineer, and thousands like him, built America’s AI empire.

item.title: Transform Your Relationship With Customers With Five-Star Hospitality
item.description: Hospitality turns service into relationship, and transactions into something people remember.

item.title: Can Humans Answer Your Questions Better Than AI? For the Next 24 Hours, You Can Find Out
item.description: For one day, residents of Quilicura, Chile are offering themselves as a human-powered alternative to ChatGPT.
